entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
